attributes.background:
People are campaigning for the sky to be littered with night sky patterns in support of the NHS
We are being encouraged to litter pollute and case untold damage to wildlife and animals in fields and potentially setting fire to horses wearing rugs, tress a shrubs 
These items need to be banned

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310556
